title: Eco-Friendly Haven with Modern Comfort in Suburb, Nowy Sacz
description: Welcome to this modern, eco-conscious house offering 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 contemporary bathrooms, and 136 sqm of ergonomic living space. Flooded with natural light through large windows, the home features sumptuous hardwood floors and a generous balcony ideal for enjoying tranquil outdoor moments. Wide hallways and wheelchair-friendly design speak to thoughtful accessibility. Journey effortlessly to shared green areas, meticulously maintained for year-round relaxation within a caring community.
neighborhood_description: Located in the peaceful Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sacz, this house is enveloped by nature and a pet-friendly atmosphere, reflecting a responsible, eco-conscious community spirit. Future-forward developments and ongoing enhancements make this low-urban level area an attractive, growing neighborhood for families and long-term renters. Convenient highway access ensures excellent connectivity to regional centers and neighboring towns—ideal for commuting professionals or those seeking both serenity and modern convenience.
target_buyer: Long-term renters or families seeking stability in a quiet, nature-focused neighborhood with a commitment to sustainability and community.
market_positioning: This property uniquely combines accessible modern living and sustainable design in a fast-developing, eco-minded locale, ideal for tenants seeking comfort and long-term roots away from the density and bustle of city life—all at a competitive market price.
